p: The results revealed the ability of the new compounds to inhibit the growth of the selected cancer cell lines with IC 50 values in the range of 0.16–34.13 μM. Among these derivatives, compound 18b was the most active against MCF-7 cells (IC 50 = 0.19 μM), while compounds 19a and 20a were the most potent in inhibiting the growth of HT29 and A2780 cell line, respectively.
